          <title>
            <string language="en">What gold is made of</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von welchem Gold gebildet wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De quel or est fait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que ouro é feito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che oro è fatto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιος χρυσός αποτελείται από</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué oro se hace</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the atoms that make up a gold ring and the particles that make up the each gold atom.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Atome, die einen 
Goldring und die Partikel bilden, die das jedes Goldatom bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les atomes qui composent
une boucle d'or et les particules qui composent le chaque atome d'or.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os átomos que fazem 
acima um anel do ouro e as partículas que façam acima cada átomo do
ouro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli atomi che 
compongono un anello dell'oro e le particelle che compongono l'ogni 
atomo dell'oro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα άτομα που αποτελούν 
ένα χρυσό δαχτυλίδι και τα μόρια που αποτελούν το κάθε χρυσό 
άτομο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los átomos que hacen 
para arriba un anillo del oro y las partículas que hagan para arriba 
el cada átomo del oro.</string>
          </description>
